description:
Ultra Male Eau De Toilette - The Ultimate Expression of Modern Masculinity

Experience the bold intensity of Jean Paul Gaultier Ultra Male, a powerful and seductive fragrance that redefines masculine allure. This bestselling scent captures attention with its distinctive character and long-lasting presence. The iconic sailor bottle in deep navy blue with red stripes perfectly encapsulates the daring spirit of this intense masculine fragrance. âœ¨

Product Information

Size 125ml
Gender Men
Product Type Eau De Toilette
Concentration Eau De Toilette Intense
Brand Jean Paul Gaultier

The Captivating Scent Profile of Ultra Male

This oriental fougÃ¨re fragrance delivers an intoxicating blend that evolves beautifully throughout the day. ðŸ”¥

Top Notes Bergamot, Pear, Lavender, Mint
Heart Notes Cinnamon, Clary Sage, Caraway
Base Notes Vanilla, Amber, Cedar, Patchouli, Black Woods

Key Features of Ultra Male EDT

  • Intense and long-lasting formula perfect for evening wear and special occasions ðŸ’Ž
  • Distinctive sweet yet masculine profile with prominent vanilla and spice notes
  • Iconic sailor-inspired bottle design in deep navy blue with red accents
  • Superior projection and sillage that commands attention
  • Versatile enough for year-round use but particularly stunning in cooler months ðŸŒ¿

The Legacy Behind Ultra Male

Launched in 2015 as a more intense flanker to the original Le Male, Jean Paul Gaultier's Ultra Male was created by perfumer Francis Kurkdjian. This master perfumer amplified the sweet and spicy aspects of the original composition to create a bolder, more contemporary interpretation. The fragrance quickly became a signature scent for confident men who embrace their sensuality and strength. The distinctive sailor bottle, a hallmark of the Le Male line, was reimagined in deeper, more intense colors to reflect the amplified scent profile.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Ultra Male EDT last on skin?

Ultra Male is renowned for its exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin with moderate to strong projection. The rich vanilla and amber base notes ensure the fragrance remains detectable even after a full day of wear. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on well-moisturized skin. Many users report that clothing sprayed with Ultra Male can retain the scent for several days. ðŸ’«

Elevate your presence with the unforgettable aura of Jean Paul Gaultier Ultra Male â€“ where intensity meets sophistication in a bottle that's as bold as the man who wears it. ðŸŒ¸
short_description: Experience the intense masculinity of Jean Paul Gaultier Ultra Male EDT. This powerful 125ml fragrance blends juicy pear, spicy cinnamon, and rich vanilla for a bold, seductive signature scent that commands attention and lasts all day.
seo_title: Ultra Male EDT 125ml: 8+ Hours of Intense Masculine Power
meta_description: Discover Jean Paul Gaultier Ultra Male EDT 125ml with its irresistible blend of pear, cinnamon, and vanilla. This long-lasting masculine fragrance turns heads everywhere. Shop now!
